entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. 30 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. 30 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 60 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains late in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:58 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
